price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߡߊߕߎ߬ߙߍ߬ߕߎ߬ߙߍ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߥߊߘߌ߫ ߡߎߙߊ߲ ߠߎ߬ ߣߌ߫ ߘߎ߬ߡߊ߬ ߞߙߏ ߟߎ߬ ߘߌ߫
arabic: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيۡهِم بِـَٔانِيَةٖ مِّن فِضَّةٖ وَأَكۡوَابٖ كَانَتۡ قَوَارِيرَا۠

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wayuṭāfu ʿalayhim biāniyatin min fiḍḍatin wa-akwābin kānat qawārīrā
